moduleID.description: Define module ID, sub module ID

Aggregate.description: Aggregation policy. Scene change detection state transition is controlled using this parameter.

samples.description: Number of samples to consider for FIR filtering

coefficient.description: FIR filter coefficients. Number of coefficients should be same as number of samples.

samplesInput.description: Number of input samples to consider for IIR filtering

coeffInput.description: IIR filter input coefficients. IIR filter output is computed as: y[n] = (b0 * x[n] + b1 * x[n-1] + ...) - (a1 * y[n-1] + ...) b is input coefficients and a is output coefficients. Number of coefficients should be same as number of samples.

samplesOutput.description: Number of output samples to consider for IIR filtering

coeffOutput.description: IIR filter output coefficients. IIR filter output is computed as: y[n] = (b0 * x[n] + b1 * x[n-1] + ...) - (a1 * y[n-1] + ...) b is input coefficients and a is output coefficients. Number of coefficients should be same as number of samples.

samples.description: Number of samples to consider for median filtering

fixedBaselineEn.description: True indicates fixed value will be use, else baseline will be updated dynamically after rebase

fixedBaselineValue.description: Fixed baseline value. It will be used only if fixed baseline is enabled.

triggerTh.description: Trigger threshold. If residual(input - baseline) is more than threshold, it will be considered as scene change.

consCountTh.description: Counting threshold for the residue is constantly above/below the trigger_threshold.

postSCDFramesTh.description: Min frames to analyze post SCD for checking scene is stable or not.

postSCDStableTh.description: Percentage threshold, if variation between frames is below this threshold indicates scene is stable (post SCD).

holdTime.description: Post scene change, holding time will be ON for given time duration and it will be off automatically.

strictHoldTime.description: Post scene change, scene stable, do not reset holding time, wait till its get completed.

slowConvReduceFactor.description: In holding time, reduce the convergence by using this factor

fastConvBoostFactor.description: Post scene change, once scene is stable use this factor for faster convergence.

fastConvergePercTh.description: If percentage max gain change between current frame input and output of temporal filter is more than this threshold, use fast convergence boost factor.

waitFramesBeforeSCStart.description: Before starting the new scene change, wait for N frames.
